AI Description: LyveSET is a microbial variant detection pipeline for Whole Genome Sequencing data. It identifies single nucleotide variants (SNVs), insertion and deletions (indels) using a Bayesian algorithm. LyveSET is primarily used for the analysis of bacterial genomes.
Core Features: Variant Detection For Whole Genome Sequencing Data, Identifies Snvs & Indels, Uses Bayesian Algorithm For Variant Calling, Specifically Designed For Bacterial Genomes Analysis
General Tags: Bioinformatics, Genomics, Variant Detection, Microbial Genomics
